member.name: T:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahAliases
member.summary: Contains functionality related to running javascript unit tests using Chutzpah.

member.summary: Runs tests in the specified testFile (or in the working directory if null) with the specified settings (or default settings if null).

member.summary: Options to launch tests in browser

member.summary: Launch in default browser

member.summary: The Chutzpah Runner.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahRunner.Name
member.summary: Gets the name.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahRunner.ToolExecutableNames
member.summary: Gets the tool executable names.

member.name: M:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahRunner.Run(Cake.Core.IO.Path,Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings)
member.summary: Runs tests in the specified testFile (or in the working directory if null) with the specified settings (or default settings if null).
member.param: The Path to the file that should be tested.
The settings to use when executing Chutzpah.

member.name: M:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahRunner.GetToolName
member.summary: Gets the name of the tool.

member.name: M:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahRunner.GetToolExecutableNames
member.summary: Gets the possible names of the tool executable.

member.name: T:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings
member.summary: Contains settings used by .

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.OutputRunningTestCount
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to output running test count. Default is true
member.value: true if [output running test count]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.ForceTeamCityMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to force team city mode. (normally auto-detected) -- default is false
member.value: true if [force team city mode]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.FailOnError
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to return a non-zero exit code if any script errors or timeouts occurs
member.value: true if [fail on error]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.NoLogo
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to run without showing the copyright message.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.PrintDebugInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to print debugging information and tracing to console.
member.value: true if [print debug information]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.Trace
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to Log tracing information to chutzpah.log.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.EnableCoverageCollection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable coverage collection.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.ShowFailureReport
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show a failure report after the test run. Useful if you have a large number of tests..

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.LaunchInBrowser
member.summary: Gets or sets an option to Launch the tests in a browser. If an option other than None is provided will try to launch in that browser.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.MaxParallelism
member.summary: Gets or sets the Max degree of parallelism for Chutzpah. Defaults to number of CPUs + 1 If you specify more than 1 the test output may be a bit jumbled

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.AdditionalTestPaths
member.summary: Gets the list of test paths to run. Specify more than one to add multiple paths. If you give a folder, it will be scanned for testable files.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.JUnitXmlResultsFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path for JUnit-style XML results output. If null (default), Chutzpah will not output JUnit xml results.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.NUnit2XmlResultsFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path for NUnit (v2.x) XML results output. If null (default), Chutzpah will not output NUnit xml results.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.LcovResultsFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path to output results as LCOV data for further processing. If null (default), Chutzpah will not output LCOV data results.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.VisualStudioTrxResultsFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path for Visual Studio Trx results output. If null (default), Chutzpah will not output Visual Studio Trx results.

member.name: P:Cake.Chutzpah.ChutzpahSettings.CoverageHtmlOutputFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path default Chutzpah coverage HTML output. If null (default), Chutzpah will not output a coverage HTML file.
